document_data.name: Riurmorn's Silks and Linens
document_data.mainbody: '''Riurmorn's Silks and Linens''' was a shop in [[Moontassel]] that sold textiles imported from [[Sembia]] as well as [[silk]] from the east during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The shop also sold [[carpet]]s and [[linen]]s. One was able to get a good deal on carpets if they did not mind the bloodstains. The establishment was run by [[Riurmorn]], who was secretly an agent for the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
